description:
1001 a game inspired by the movie "9" that came out in 2009.

Official Movie Poster

 

1001 (stands for 9 in binary) is a single-player adventure game made by 3 first year game development students who got inspired by the movie “9” to continue the story through a game.

The games’ objective is to save the world once again after a mysterious rain brought back all dead to life. Will you be able to fight your enemies once again and save your dearest friends?

Dont forget to check out The Art of 1001 made by each student :)

Created by:

  • Ana Dos Santos artstation.com/ana_santos
  • Diana Levay artstation.com/nanilevay
  • Rodrigo Pinheiro
